summary: The Dockerfile defines an image based on Python 3.9, copies the app files, sets the working directory, and installs required packages before running the q.py script.

details.comment: The Dockerfile defines an image based on Python 3.9, copies the app files, sets the working directory, and installs required packages before running the q.py script.
details.content:
FROM python:3.9
COPY . /app
WORKDIR /app
RUN pip install autogen numpy
CMD ["python", "./q.py"]
